arts.ttl: Unai Emery expresses contentment with ‘clean sheet’ as Villa ‘compete’ for a draw at Everton
arts.sum: They have not overcome the faults of a slow start to the Premier League season, but Unai Emery saw signs of improvement. Villa have had a poor start to the season.

arts.ttl: Everton miss big chances in draw with Aston Villa
arts.sum: Aston Villa are still yet to score their first Premier League goal of the season after a 0-0 draw with Everton at Hill Dickinson Stadium.

arts.ttl: David Moyes says Aston Villa star did something 'really good' during 0-0 Everton draw
Emi Martinez ‘baffles’ BBC pundit after selfish Aston Villa moment vs Everton

arts.ttl: Emi Martinez shows true Aston Villa feelings in draw vs Everton, Tim Sherwood is spot on

arts.ttl: What Simon Hooper told Everton star about controversial Morgan Rogers incident

arts.ttl: Everton 0-0 Aston Villa ANALYSIS: The out-of-form star who needs 'protecting' after another drab display from the visitors - and how Unai Emery is missing Marcus Rashford
arts.sum: TOM COLLOMOSSE: At least three times in the last two transfer windows, Ollie Watkins probably imagined himself somewhere else. Last January, the England forward thought he was moving to Arsenal.

arts.ttl: Aston Villa have fallen into mediocrity but Everton draw provides slim hope of a revival
arts.sum: Everton 0-0 Aston Villa: Emiliano Martinez put in a brilliant goalkeeping display to secure a point away from home against the Toffees

arts.ttl: Everton vs Aston Villa - Player Ratings: Several positives despite goalless draw
arts.sum: The Blues were held to a goalless draw despite a commendable performance against Aston Villa.

arts.ttl: All square: Villa draw another blank in stalemate with Everton
arts.sum: Everton and Aston VIlla play out a goalless draw in Saturday's Premier League contest at Hill Dickinson Stadium.
